name: Note of The Day [DEMO]
description:
Story:

After waking up from sleep, you find that everyone has vanished. You don't have anyone to talk to, or ask for advice from. The only thing that can help you discover the truth is that there are notes you can read.

How To Install:
  1. Download the Game from Itch
  2. Extract the NoTD-B2.zip file (once downloaded)
  3. Run: Note of The Day.exe
Trigger Warnings:
  • This game contains very loud noises.
  • This game contains flashing lights that may not be suitable for everyone.
  • This game contains visual effects that may cause motion sickness in some people.
Controls: W Walk Forward A Walk Left S Walk Backwards D Walk Right F Flash (Light Source) E Interact (Open Doors) CCrouch (Toggle) Mouse Look Around 

NOTE: This is a game I never released four years ago, but was reminded of it and wanted to share it with the public now. I plan on finishing this game in the future.
